skills.presentation: I am a Front-end developer specializing in web development. I can adapt to your needs by implementing certain methods such as the "mobile-first" approach to provide you with a responsive site that perfectly meets your needs. I will put my DEVOPS skills at your service to set up continuous integration and continuous deployment.
skills.text-part1: About 80% of people who visit your website will do so from a smartphone, and with mobile conversion rates up 63% compared to average desktop conversion rates, and 35% of online purchases now made via mobile devices, a mobile-first strategy can lead to greater profits for your business.
skills.text-part2: This is why it is important not to neglect mobile rendering. The mobile-first approach is based on this observation. The design process will therefore begin with the mobile view.
skills.skills: PHP, Javascript, HTML & CSS, SQL, UX, UI, AJAX, XML
skills.softskills: teamwork, creativity, flexibility, pedagogy, and autonomy
skills.tools: Git, Github/Gitlab, Visual Studio Code / IntelIJ, Wamp, PHPMyAdmin, Terminal, Figma, Slack, Trello, Jira, Miro,

einden.title: Einden
einden.description:
I spent just over a year at EINDEN as a web developer where I had the opportunity to work on over thirty projects. My missions consisted of creating responsive websites connected to the EPHOTODAM software via an API. I also had the opportunity to develop some small features, participate in the design of certain modules and sites. I also worked on the scalability of a website model.

 The technologies I used were PHP, Javascript, HTML, CSS, and XML, while respecting an AJAX method.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description:
For this project, it's simply my portfolio, which is the site you are currently on.

 The technologies used for this project are Next.js and vercel (to host the website) while following a "mobile-first" approach. I also set up continuous deployment from a Github repository.

touchdown.title: get-touchdown
touchdown.description:
For this project, it's the e-commerce landing page of get-touchdown, for which I created something very catchy with eye-catching effects, something creative and original.

 The Next.js framework was used for this project, which is hosted on Vercel. Continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) have been implemented. I also linked the site to Stripe (a payment module).

bar.title: Aux plaisirs démodes
bar.description: For this project, it is the showcase website of a bar in Rennes. I created this website using HTML, CSS, and Javascript. Additionally, I set up continuous deployment from a Github repository. I also integrated the Google Maps API to display the bar's location on a map.

showcase.description: The best solution to start increasing your visibility on the web.

ecommerce.description: The ideal solution for selling your products online.
ecommerce.info1.1: Creation of the site including 1 to 5 articles

other.description: Do you have a project in mind? I am at your disposal to help you.
